name: Golden Run
description:
This is Golden Run. You are a robber that steals all gold within the area however you only get 60 seconds to do so and you also have to run from the cops. 

How much gold will you get?

Some feature was not finished however I may work on them within the future.

Also any comments or feedback will be appreciated!

music was found on royalty free website. other than that i designed everything else.
